_sText:
Map: Jalalabad
Game: Counter-Strike Source
Game mode: Bomb-Defuse, Hostage Rescue, Combat/Skill, AWP
Players: 2-64
Map info:




Jalalabad Map Pack is 4 maps:

de_jalalabad - Bomb-Defuse

Terrorists trying to destabilize the situation in the city, blowing up mosques. Counter-Terrorists must stop their plan.


cs_jalalabad - Hostage Rescue

Terrorists want to execute foreign journalists. Counter-Terrorists must stop their plan.


aim_jalalabad - Combat/Skill

Combat version of the Jalalabad map. Weapon is issued randomly(ak47, m4a1, aug, sg550).


awp_jalalabad - Sniper War

AWP version of the Jalalabad map. Available only Arctic Warfare Magnum.


Install:

Copy files mapname.bsp, mapname.nav, mapname.txt;

Paste files in Counter-strike Source folder, example - "C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\YOUR_ACCOUNT_NAME\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps".



[Video on Youtube](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kTVQoZ9ejZU "Video on Youtube")
